GSD.description:
staging: vc04_services: Fix RCU dereference check

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.11 by commit 3f09310ec5b33540bd1d6d4663d112a8eb1ed8f4. For more details please see the references link.
